summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3244, for the improvement of 37th Place, from Hanford Street to Horton Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 40219 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
